jodd.madvoc.component

Class ResultMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.component.ResultMapper

  • public class ResultMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Mapper from action results paths to result path. Certain set of results defines path where to forward/redirect etc. This mapper converts result path to real path. Result path may contain some macros that will be resolved. Here are the macros that can be used:
    • <alias> - replaced with alias value
    • # - strips words from path (goes 'back')

      protected java.lang.String resultPathPrefix
      Default prefix for all result paths.
